Deadfur: Just great... How about a Minion attack while everyone else's
at i=
t?

He opened the Maximal only frenquency.

Deadfur: Troops, this is Deadfu=
r speaking. We have a report of another
wave of Preds coming in. We have to=
 get rid of that giant bug before
they get here, unless some of you can man=
age to turn him the other way
around. For now, continue with hit-and-run. T=
ry to sneak up on him and
to plant some bombs there. Engineering, how's the=
 shield comin' up?

Officer: Slowly, commander. We don't have the city cove=
red yet, but we
do have defenses over the gravitaion nullifiers. It will ta=
ke a lot
before they shoot us down from the skies.

Deafur: Good, keep work=
ing on it. Keep up the efforts, soldiers!

The small fliers were buzzing qu=
ickly around Skorponok, strafing him
with lasers and missiles, while higher=
 up, a team was trying a "rock
drop" technique. They were miles high above =
the Decepticon and
dropping small but heavy bombs that would generate a big=
ger impact
because of the altitude...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richa=
rd Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder thinks over=
 this change in events before opening a return
channel to Deadfur.

> Eld=
er: You're not going to like it. I'm showing what appears to be a
whole squ=
adren of fliers and probably more coming your way. Since you
are on site an=
d assisting the Maximals I'm scrapping the 'no
interference' order. I'm on =
my way and I'll try and get as much back
up as possible.

s to an open Watcher channel.

 of our ranks is directing
the defense of the Maximal City Relay. They are =
faced with a
Decepticon attack and a coming Predacon assualt. They are to r=
ecieve
are full aid. I'm going there myself. Elder out.

unications and heads for the exit. Only Watchers know
how to survive the ha=
rsh lands around their base. Avoid them.

mall shuttle pod that will get him to
the main land.

@...> wrote:

d force?
